definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
sentences.chinese: 菜场新开了一家专卖冷鲜肉的店铺。

sentences.english: Monopoly received a repair call, inform production enterprise or service team.
sentences.chinese: 专卖点接到报修电话后，通知生产企业或服务队伍。

sentences.english: This shop is an exclusive porcelain shop.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店是磁器专卖店。

sentences.english: Picture showing a departmental store selling Indonesia's made products.
sentences.chinese: 图片展示一间专卖印尼制造之产品的小百货。

sentences.english: Welcome to Giant store, I can provide with any help?
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临捷安特专卖店，我能为您做些什么？

sentences.english: She makes bow ties manually in the evening to sell at her own brand store, Winz.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上会做一些手工领结拿到自己的品牌专卖店卖。

sentences.english: Our action is not to admission exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的方针是不授与专卖权。

sentences.english: It has also been boosted by new Asian stores and weak sterling.
sentences.chinese: 新开设的亚洲专卖店和疲软的英镑也助推了它的增长。

sentences.english: Nine new franchised stores opened, including seven in China.
sentences.chinese: 在九家新开张的专卖店中，中国占了七家。

sentences.english: The kimono had to be picked up at the boutique.
sentences.chinese: 但必须亲自去到那家专卖店才能拿到和服。

sentences.english: And now, YakPak's large roster of boutique customers dependably receive their small-lot orders.
sentences.chinese: 公司的客户里也包括许多小型的服装专卖店。

sentences.english: Our policy is not to grant exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 我们的方针是不授于专卖权。

sentences.english: They step into a speciality store.
sentences.chinese: 她们走进了一家专卖店。

sentences.english: Jotun Multicolor Paints Centre, supplies a variety of hardware, building materials and electrical products.
sentences.chinese: 家庭五金专卖店，提供各种工具用品，建筑及电动。

sentences.english: You can buy it in our golf pro-shop.
sentences.chinese: 您可以到我们的高尔夫球专卖店购买。

sentences.english: Study on Tobacco Industry Administration-System on Monopoly;
sentences.chinese: 在很多国家，烟草是政府的专卖事业。

definition: to specialize in (a particular product or service)/monopoly
to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
